fields.title: Tomb Raider Welcome Page Hero
fields.description: Lara jumps toward a temple covered in greenery

welcomePage.meetLaraCroftDescription:
Lara Croft is a fearless archaeologist and adventurer, renowned for her relentless pursuit of ancient secrets and artifacts. As the wealthy heiress to the famous Croft family, she enjoys a life of luxury, but her true passion lies in unearthing the mysteries of the past. Her style and wit make her a charismatic figure, whether she's attending high-society galas or navigating treacherous tombs in search of lost relics.

Lara's adventures often plunge her into an underworld teeming with collectors, raiders, and danger. Her survival skills and expertise with various weapons, including her signature dual pistols, ensures she's always prepared for any challenge. Balancing elegance and tenacity, Lara's life is a blend of high-stakes adventure and astounding discoveries. Her legendary status as a Tomb Raider continues to grow, inspiring awe and admiration across the globe.

fields.name: Dual Pistols
fields.description: Lara's dual pistols aren't just weapons; they're symbols of her fearless spirit and unmatched precision in the heat of battle. Passed down from her late mentor, Conrad Roth, these pistols are a constant reminder of the legacy she carries and the unyielding determination that fuels her every move. Lara prefers dual pistols in the heat of close combat and has mastered their use, even during her signature acrobatic moves!

Tomb Raider 1996 Logo

fields.description: Experience Lara Croft's adventures as the Tomb Raider

content.value: Adventurer Lara Croft has been hired to recover the pieces of an ancient artifact known as the Scion. With her fearless acrobatic style she runs, jumps, swims and climbs her way towards the truth of its origin & powers - leaving only a trail of empty tombs and gun-cartridges in her wake.

fields.shortDescription: The game that started a franchise - explore Lara Croft's original adventure as she recovers pieces of an ancient artifact known as the Scion.

fields.timelineDescription: Archaeologist and adventurer Lara Croft embarks on a perilous quest to retrieve the Scion, a mystical artifact from Atlantis. After exploring ancient ruins and confronting deadly foes, including a showdown with the famous T-REX, she discovers the true intentions of her employer, Natla, an ancient Atlantean ruler. Lara ultimately destroys the Scion to prevent Natla from using it to dominate the world.

fields.title: Tomb Raider II

fields.name: PC & Console Games
fields.description: Experience Lara Croft's adventures as the Tomb Raider

content.value: The second installment in the Tomb Raider series invites you to join Lara as she travels around the globe to retrieve the Dagger of Xian, a legendary artifact said to give its possessor the power of a fire breathing dragon. Lara must race against the nefarious Fiamma Nera, a secret society dedicated to exploiting the power of the Dagger.

fields.shortDescription: Join Lara Croft as she travels around the globe to retrieve a precious artifact before it falls into the wrong hands.

fields.timelineDescription: Lara Croft races to prevent the Fiamma Nera cult from obtaining the Dagger of Xian, an artifact capable of transforming its wielder into a dragon. Her journey takes her from Venice to China, where she confronts the cult leader in a climactic battle, ultimately securing the dagger and returning home victorious.

fields.title: Tomb Raider III: Adventures of Lara Croft

fields.name: PC & Console Games
fields.description: Experience Lara Croft's adventures as the Tomb Raider

content.value: Thousands of years ago, a meteor crashed into Antarctica and the shockwaves of its impact are being felt in the modern age. Lara Croft will follow clues leading to a deadly secret, boldly leaping chasms and blasting monsters with mysterious origins. Join Lara Croft on a complex adventure that combines puzzles with high-speed action.

fields.shortDescription: Thousands of years ago, a meteor crashed into Antarctica and the shockwaves of its impact are still being felt in the modern age. In this third installment of the Tomb Raider series, Lara Croft faces a mystery far beyond our understanding.

fields.timelineDescription: Lara Croft tracks down four powerful artifacts linked to a meteorite, leading her across the globe from Nevada to Antarctica. She faces deadly adversaries, including mutated creatures created by a cosmetics mogul, and ultimately confronts Dr. Willard, a scientist bent on harnessing the meteorite's power.

fields.title: Tomb Raider: The Last Revelation
Tomb Raider IV Logo US
fields.description: Tomb Raider IV Logo US

fields.name: PC & Console Games
fields.description: Experience Lara Croft's adventures as the Tomb Raider

content.value: According to Egyptian legend, Horus, son of the light, outwitted the evil God Set and imprisoned him in a secret tomb. Five thousand years later, Lara Croft discovers the lost tomb and unwittingly unleashes Set, fulfilling the ancient prophecy of his return to plunge mankind into darkness. In a race against time, Lara must use all her wit and skill to re-imprison Set and save the world from Armageddon. Lara must overcome the most ingenious puzzles and infernal traps ever devised while facing terrifying evil from beyond the grave.

fields.shortDescription: According to Egyptian legend, Horus, son of the light, outwitted the evil God Set and imprisoned him in a secret tomb. Five thousand years later, Lara Croft discovers the lost tomb and unwittingly unleashes Set upon the world.

fields.timelineDescription: A young Lara Crofts first expedition ends in betrayal, setting the stage for a future quest where she accidentally unleashes the dark god, Set. As she races to prevent Armageddon, she confronts her possessed former mentor, Werner Von Croy, ultimately sealing Set away. However, Laras fate remains uncertain as shes buried in a collapsing temple.

fields.title: Tomb Raider: Anniversary
Tomb Raider Anniversary Logo
fields.description: Tomb Raider Anniversary Logo

fields.name: PC & Console Games
fields.description: Experience Lara Croft's adventures as the Tomb Raider

content.value: Tomb Raider: Anniversary retraces Lara Croft's original genre-defining adventure. This globe-trotting, 3rd person action-adventure game sees Lara in pursuit of the legendary Scion artifact. Using an enhanced Tomb Raider: Legend game engine, the graphics, technology and physics bring Lara's adventure and pursuit of a mystical artifact in a way that offers gamers a completely new game play experience. Re-imagined, Anniversary delivers a dynamically fluid and fast Lara Croft, massive environments of stunning visuals, intense combat and game pacing, and an enhanced and clarified original story.

fields.shortDescription: Tomb Raider: Anniversary retraces Lara Croft's original genre-defining adventure. Using an enhanced Tomb Raider: Legend game engine, the graphics, technology and physics bring Lara's adventure and pursuit of a mystical artifact in a way that offers gamers a completely new game play experience.

fields.timelineDescription: In this remake of the original Tomb Raider, Lara Croft once again seeks the Scion, facing dangerous creatures and rival Raiders. The story reveals new details about Natla's plan to use the Scion to resurrect her Atlantean army of mutants and a doppleganger of Lara herself.

fields.name: Bow & Arrow
fields.description: Laras mastery of the bow began in her universitys archery club, The Sisters of Artemis, but it was on the dangerous island of Yamatai where she truly perfected her expertise in this classic weapon. With each upgrade to her makeshift bow, her skills became legendary, making it her go-to weapon for silent, precise strikes in the most perilous situations.

content.value: Tomb Raider explores the intense and gritty origin story of Lara Croft and her ascent from a young woman to a hardened survivor. Armed only with raw instincts and the ability to push beyond the limits of human endurance, Lara must fight to unravel the dark history of a forgotten island to escape its relentless hold.

fields.shortDescription: Tomb Raider explores the intense origin story of Lara Croft & her ascent from a young woman to a hardened survivor.

fields.timelineDescription: On her first expedition, Lara Croft is shipwrecked on an island and must survive against a cult worshipping the ancient Sun Queen, Himiko. Lara uncovers the island's dark secrets and stops a ritual that could claim her friend Samantha Nishimuras life. Ultimately, Lara ends the curse and escapes the island, finally coming to understand her fathers search for the unknown.

fields.title: Rise of the Tomb Raider: 20 Year Celebration

fields.name: PC & Console Games
fields.description: Experience Lara Croft's adventures as the Tomb Raider

fields.name: Survivor Trilogy
fields.description: See how Lara Croft becomes the Tomb Raider she was always destined to be

content.value: Rise of the Tomb Raider: 20 Year Celebration includes the base game and Season Pass, featuring all new content.

Explore Croft Manor in the new "Blood Ties" story, then defend it against a zombie invasion in "Lara's Nightmare." Survive extreme conditions with a friend in the new online Co-Op Endurance mode, and brave the new "Extreme Survivor" difficulty. This edition also features an outfit and weapon inspired by Tomb Raider III, and 5 classic Lara skins. Existing DLC will challenge you to explore a new tomb that houses an ancient terror in Baba Yaga: The Temple of the Witch, and combat waves of infected predators in Cold Darkness Awakened.

fields.shortDescription: Rise of the Tomb Raider: 20 Year Celebration includes the base game and Season Pass, featuring all new content. Explore Croft Manor in the new "Blood Ties" story, then defend it against a zombie invasion in "Lara's Nightmare."

fields.timelineDescription: Haunted by her experience on Yamatai, Lara Croft seeks the secret of immortality in the lost city of Kitezh. Together with her good friend Jonah, she confronts the Trinity organization and uncovers the truth about her fathers death while racing to stop Trinity from acquiring the Divine Source, an artifact of immense power. In the end, Lara destroys the Divine Source and resolves to continue her fight against Trinity.

Combining the base game, all seven DLC challenge tombs, as well as all downloadable weapons, outfits, and skills, Shadow of the Tomb Raider: Definitive Edition is the ultimate way to experience Laras defining moment.

fields.timelineDescription: Lara Croft accidentally triggers a Mayan apocalypse and races to stop the Trinity organization from completing a ritual that could destroy the world. As she navigates ancient tombs and confronts supernatural forces, Lara must resist a temptation to remake the world, and possibly her own parents, and ultimately sacrifices herself to save humanity, emerging at peace with her decision.

fields.name: Jade Pendant
fields.description: Discovered on her very first dig at just five years old, Lara's jade necklace is more than just her first archaeological find - it's a symbol of her lifelong passion for adventure. While her father Richard was lost in his research, Lara's keen eye uncovered the pendant, earning the admiration of her mentor Conrad Roth and becoming an important first step in her life as a Tomb Raider.

content.value: According to Egyptian legend, Horus, son of the light, outwitted the evil God Set and imprisoned him in a secret tomb. Five thousand years later, Lara Croft discovers the lost tomb and unwittingly unleashes Set, fulfilling the ancient prophecy of his return to plunge mankind into darkness. In a race against time, Lara must use all her wit and skill to re-imprison Set and save the world from Armageddon. Lara must overcome the most ingenious puzzles and infernal traps ever devised while facing terrifying evil from beyond the grave.

fields.shortDescription: According to Egyptian legend, Horus, son of the light, outwitted the evil God Set and imprisoned him in a secret tomb. Five thousand years later, Lara Croft discovers the lost tomb and unwittingly unleashes Set upon the world.

fields.timelineDescription: A young Lara Crofts first expedition ends in betrayal, setting the stage for a future quest where she accidentally unleashes the dark god, Set. As she races to prevent Armageddon, she confronts her possessed former mentor, Werner Von Croy, ultimately sealing Set away. However, Laras fate remains uncertain as shes buried in a collapsing temple.

fields.title: Tomb Raider: Anniversary
Tomb Raider Anniversary Logo
fields.description: Tomb Raider Anniversary Logo

fields.name: PC & Console Games
fields.description: Experience Lara Croft's adventures as the Tomb Raider

content.value: Tomb Raider: Anniversary retraces Lara Croft's original genre-defining adventure. This globe-trotting, 3rd person action-adventure game sees Lara in pursuit of the legendary Scion artifact. Using an enhanced Tomb Raider: Legend game engine, the graphics, technology and physics bring Lara's adventure and pursuit of a mystical artifact in a way that offers gamers a completely new game play experience. Re-imagined, Anniversary delivers a dynamically fluid and fast Lara Croft, massive environments of stunning visuals, intense combat and game pacing, and an enhanced and clarified original story.

fields.shortDescription: Tomb Raider: Anniversary retraces Lara Croft's original genre-defining adventure. Using an enhanced Tomb Raider: Legend game engine, the graphics, technology and physics bring Lara's adventure and pursuit of a mystical artifact in a way that offers gamers a completely new game play experience.

fields.timelineDescription: Driven by her mothers mysterious disappearance, Lara Croft embarks on a quest to find Excalibur, an ancient sword linked to the mythical realm of Avalon. She unravels the truth about her mothers fate, and confronts Amanda Evert, an old friend with a grudge. The journey culminates in a dramatic showdown that leaves Lara with new questions and a determination to continue her search for her mother.

fields.title: Tomb Raider: Underworld
Tomb Raider Underworld logo

fields.description: Experience Lara Croft's adventures as the Tomb Raider

content.value: Tomb Raider: Underworld represents a new advancement in exploration-based gameplay. As fearless adventurer Lara Croft explores exotic locations around the world, each location is designed with an incredible attention to detail resulting in breathtaking high-definition visual fidelity that creates a truly believable world and delivers a new level of challenge and choice. Master your surroundings by reaching new heights with the broadest range of acrobatic abilities and utilize objects within the environment to uncover new paths to explore. Discover ancient mysteries of the underworld hidden within the coast of Thailand, frozen islands in the Artic Sea, the jungles of Mexico, and more.

fields.shortDescription: As fearless adventurer Lara Croft explores exotic locations around the world, master your surroundings by reaching new heights with the broadest range of acrobatic abilities and uncover new paths to explore.

fields.name: Croft Manor
fields.description: Built during the Jacobean era, Croft Manor is a grand testament to the Croft family's aristocratic legacy, with its expansive grounds, opulent ballrooms, and storied library. But beneath its elegant surface lie hidden secrets: a concealed crypt, a secret vault where Lord Croft pursued his research, and many other mysteries only Lara herself knows about.

fields.timelineDescription: Archaeologist and adventurer Lara Croft embarks on a perilous quest to retrieve the Scion, a mystical artifact from Atlantis. After exploring ancient ruins and confronting deadly foes, including a showdown with the famous T-REX, she discovers the true intentions of her employer, Natla, an ancient Atlantean ruler. Lara ultimately destroys the Scion to prevent Natla from using it to dominate the world.

fields.title: Rise of the Tomb Raider: 20 Year Celebration

fields.name: PC & Console Games
fields.description: Experience Lara Croft's adventures as the Tomb Raider

fields.name: Survivor Trilogy
fields.description: See how Lara Croft becomes the Tomb Raider she was always destined to be

content.value: Rise of the Tomb Raider: 20 Year Celebration includes the base game and Season Pass, featuring all new content.

Explore Croft Manor in the new "Blood Ties" story, then defend it against a zombie invasion in "Lara's Nightmare." Survive extreme conditions with a friend in the new online Co-Op Endurance mode, and brave the new "Extreme Survivor" difficulty. This edition also features an outfit and weapon inspired by Tomb Raider III, and 5 classic Lara skins. Existing DLC will challenge you to explore a new tomb that houses an ancient terror in Baba Yaga: The Temple of the Witch, and combat waves of infected predators in Cold Darkness Awakened.

fields.shortDescription: Rise of the Tomb Raider: 20 Year Celebration includes the base game and Season Pass, featuring all new content. Explore Croft Manor in the new "Blood Ties" story, then defend it against a zombie invasion in "Lara's Nightmare."

fields.timelineDescription: Haunted by her experience on Yamatai, Lara Croft seeks the secret of immortality in the lost city of Kitezh. Together with her good friend Jonah, she confronts the Trinity organization and uncovers the truth about her fathers death while racing to stop Trinity from acquiring the Divine Source, an artifact of immense power. In the end, Lara destroys the Divine Source and resolves to continue her fight against Trinity.

content.value:
Experience Lara Crofts defining moment as she becomes the Tomb Raider. In Shadow of the Tomb Raider, Lara must master a deadly jungle, overcome terrifying tombs, and persevere through her darkest hour. As she races to save the world from a Maya apocalypse, Lara will ultimately be forged into the Tomb Raider she is destined to be.

Survive and Thrive In the Deadliest Place on Earth: Master an unforgiving jungle setting in order to survive. Explore underwater environments filled with crevasses and deep tunnel systems.

fields.name: Winston
fields.description:
Born into a family that has lived near and worked for the Crofts going back generations, Winston Smith has been the Croft family butler ever since being honorably discharged from the military with an injury in his mid-20s. As a teen he also worked with his father as the Crofts gamekeeper and developed a bond with Lord Richard Croft, Laras father, so the transition to household butler made perfect sense. As Laras parents went off globetrotting on their own excursions, Winston developed a close relationship with Lara and attends to most of the Croft Manor needs in her absence.

Winston is, above all, wise. He knows how to gently let someone know they may not be completely right without bruising their ego. Formidably patient, he never gets angry and always seeks a calm, rational solution to every problem. He really has only one anxiety: that someone might harm Lara, whom he has come to regard, though it remains unspoken, as something like a granddaughter.

fields.name: PC & Console Games
fields.description: Experience Lara Croft's adventures as the Tomb Raider

content.value: Lara Croft is missing in Egypt - presumed dead. Those closest to her gather together at the Croft Estate on a grey, rainy day for a memorial service in her honor. Afterwards, the friends sit quietly together in the study of the Croft Mansion and reminisce about Lara's past exploits; exploits that have until now remained a secret. In flashback sequences, the player relives four of Lara's adventures: the hunt for the Philosopher's Stone in Rome, a deep-sea dive off the coast of Russia in search of the Spear of Destiny, an encounter with Hellspawn in Ireland, and a foray into an office complex in search of the Iris artifact.

fields.timelineDescription: Friends of Lara Croft recall untold adventures after her presumed death in Egypt. These include her quest for the Philosopher's Stone in Rome, the Spear of Destiny from a sunken submarine, and a battle against an ancient demon on the Black Isle. The story concludes with a glimmer of hope as her backpack is found by Von Croy in Egypt, leaving her fate unresolved.

fields.name: Zip
fields.description: Zip originally moved to London on a computer science scholarship at the University of College of London after graduating early from high school in the U.S. There, he quickly befriended Lara Croft and Samantha Nishimura, and the three became fast friends who spent time together traveling abroad and going on adventures. In these early days, he began providing technical assistance for Lara  enjoying the challenging problems her adventures posed for him. A tech prodigy with skills in programming, electronics, and hacking, Zip never completed his studies at UCL but established himself as a freelance consultant. When Lara reclaimed her fortune, she hired Zip as her exclusive technical consultant, a role he still holds while continuing to moonlight on the side. Loyal to Lara, Zip has been part of many of her adventures and remains close friends with both Sam and Jonah.

As fearless adventurer Lara Croft explores exotic locations around the world, each location is designed with an incredible attention to detail resulting in breathtaking high-definition visual fidelity that creates a truly believable world and delivers a new level of challenge and choice. Master your surroundings by reaching new heights with the broadest range of acrobatic abilities and utilize objects within the environment to uncover new paths to explore. Discover ancient mysteries of the underworld hidden within the coast of Thailand, frozen islands in the Artic Sea, the jungles of Mexico, and more.

fields.timelineDescription: Lara Crofts search for her parents fate leads her to confront the resurrected Atlantean Natla and stop her plan to awaken the Midgard Serpent. With the help of Thors artifacts, Lara confronts her doppelganger and uncovers the truth about her mothers tragic end, ultimately saving the world from destruction but accepting her loss.

fields.name: Jonah
fields.description:
Jonah Maiava is a like a brother to Lara Croft and has been in her life since she was a teenager. A man with a deep spiritual connection to nature and a passion for cooking, Jonah was born in New Zealand where he endured a troubled childhood, including living with an abusive father and the tragic loss of his brother. After moving to Hawaii to live with his grandmother, Jonah honed his culinary skills, which later became one of his defining traits.

He joined the New Zealand army, where he acquired valuable skills that would aid him in his adventures. After a military injury, Jonah was honorably discharged and eventually joined the crew of Conrad Roths Endurance. His natural talent for cooking and impressive strength earned him a spot on the ship, leading to his long-standing friendship with Lara Croft. After the harrowing adventure on Yamatai, Jonah became Laras confidant and companion on many subsequent adventures.

content.value: Tomb Raider: Definitive Survivor Trilogy is the complete edition of the award-winning Tomb Raider origin games. This collection contains all the definitive edition content from each critically acclaimed prequel title - Tomb Raider: Definitive Edition, Rise of the Tomb Raider: 20 Year Celebration, and Shadow of the Tomb Raider: Definitive Edition.

Follow Lara on her formative journey across the world, starting in Tomb Raider where she finds herself trapped on the shrouded island of Yamatai off the coast of Japan, to the harsh Siberian tundra hiding an immortal secret in Rise of the Tomb Raider, and finally to the mountainous landscape of Peru to uncover a cataclysmic power in Shadow of the Tomb Raider. With all the definitive edition content from each game, this Trilogy promises dozens of hours of breathtaking exploration, challenging puzzle-solving, and survival combat with Lara as she becomes the Tomb Raider she was destined to be.

fields.title: Tomb Raider: The Legend of Lara Croft

content.value: Following the events of the
Survivor Trilogy

, Lara Croft (voiced by Hayley Atwell) has abandoned her friends to embark on increasingly more perilous solo adventures. But she must return home when a dangerous and powerful Chinese artifact is stolen from Croft Manor by a thief with an uncanny personal connection. Her daring pursuit will take her on an adventure around the world and to the depths of forgotten tombs, where she will be forced to confront her true self, and decide just what kind of hero she wants to become.
Starring Hayley Atwell as Lara Croft, Tomb Raider: The Legend of Lara Croft premiers October 10th only on Netflix.

fields.name: Roth
fields.description:
Conrad Roth was a British wreck-diver, treasure hunter, and former military serviceman, who spent years adventuring with his good friend Lord Richard Croft. As the Captain of the research vessel Endurance, Roth was known for his hands-on, no-nonsense leadership, balancing toughness with an easy-going nature that inspired loyalty among his crew. His adventurous career took him around the world, earning him a reputation for competence and a willingness to bend laws in pursuit of historical artifacts.

Roth's strong ties to Lord Richard Croft led him to become Lara Croft's godfather and mentor, teaching her weapon and survival skills that would later prove crucial in her own adventures. Despite his many relationships, including an affair with Joslin Reyes, which led to a daughter he never met, Roth remained deeply committed to the sea. His final expedition to Yamatai ended in tragedy, where he sacrificed his life to save Lara, cementing his legacy as a courageous and selfless man.

fields.name: Natla
fields.description:
Jacqueline Natla is a biologist, geneticist, and CEO of Natla Technologies and views the human race as incapable of managing their own destiny. As a member of the ancient Atlantean Triumvirate, she wielded the power of the Scion, an artifact of immense power. Her vision to rapidly evolve humanity led her to create a race of mutated beasts, sparking a conflict with her fellow Triumvirate members, Qualopec and Tihocan, who ultimately defeated and imprisoned her in cryogenic hibernation.

After being accidentally released from her imprisonment thousands of years later, Natla adopted the name Jacqueline Natla and began rebuilding her plans for humanity's forced evolution. She founded Natla Technologies, mastering genetic mutation and laying the groundwork for her ultimate goal: to reclaim the Scion, create a superior human race, and rule a new world.

fields.timelineDescription: Archaeologist and adventurer Lara Croft embarks on a perilous quest to retrieve the Scion, a mystical artifact from Atlantis. After exploring ancient ruins and confronting deadly foes, including a showdown with the famous T-REX, she discovers the true intentions of her employer, Natla, an ancient Atlantean ruler. Lara ultimately destroys the Scion to prevent Natla from using it to dominate the world.

content.value: Tomb Raider: Anniversary retraces Lara Croft's original genre-defining adventure. This globe-trotting, 3rd person action-adventure game sees Lara in pursuit of the legendary Scion artifact. Using an enhanced Tomb Raider: Legend game engine, the graphics, technology and physics bring Lara's adventure and pursuit of a mystical artifact in a way that offers gamers a completely new game play experience. Re-imagined, Anniversary delivers a dynamically fluid and fast Lara Croft, massive environments of stunning visuals, intense combat and game pacing, and an enhanced and clarified original story.

content.value: Her legacy lives on!
Play the next series of Tomb Raider adventures in this remastered collection of the Darkness Trilogy.
Included Game Titles
Tomb Raider: The Last Revelation  Lara Croft discovers the lost tomb of the Egyptian God Set, unwittingly unleashing him and fulfilling an ancient prophecyone that plunges mankind into darkness.

Tomb Raider: Chronicles  Following the events of The Last Revelation, Lara Croft is buried in an Egyptian tomb and is presumed dead. At her memorial, those closest to her reminisce about secrets from her past.

Tomb Raider: The Angel of Darkness  Accused of murder, Lara becomes a fugitive on the run, while uncovering a sinister conspiracy involving alchemical experiments and the search for ancient artifacts.
Key Features
See the Classic & Remastered Visuals: Play with the original polygonal models or swap to the remastered graphics at any time
Travel the Globe: Follow Lara Croft around iconic locales including Cairo, Rome, Paris, and many more
Experience Laras Darkest Adventures: Uncover the secrets of Lara Crofts past and shed light on the mystery of her disappearance

content.value:
Lara Croft makes her Nintendo Switch debut with two Tomb Raider adventures in one treasure-packed bundle, featuring non-stop arcade combat and 2-4 player co-op. Leap into the fast-paced arcade combat and puzzle-packed platforming of two outstanding adventures for tomb raiders of all abilities; enjoyably easy to pick up, rewardingly difficult to master.

Penetrate dense jungles and navigate elaborate Aztec ruins in Lara Croft & The Guardian of Light, and investigate the cursed tombs of ancient pharaohs in Lara Croft & The Temple of Osiris. Blast through hordes of supernatural foes, overcome intricate Challenge Tombs, beat high scores, and equip yourself with a massive arsenal of unlockable weapons, equipment, and magical artifacts.

Follow Lara on her formative journey across the world, starting in Tomb Raider where she finds herself trapped on the shrouded island of Yamatai off the coast of Japan, to the harsh Siberian tundra hiding an immortal secret in Rise of the Tomb Raider, and finally to the mountainous landscape of Peru to uncover a cataclysmic power in Shadow of the Tomb Raider. With all the definitive edition content from each game, this Trilogy promises dozens of hours of breathtaking exploration, challenging puzzle-solving, and survival combat with Lara as she becomes the Tomb Raider she was destined to be.

products.shortDescription: Experience the complete edition of the award-winning Tomb Raider origin games with all definitive edition content as Lara Croft becomes the Tomb Raider she was destined to be.

products.timelineDescription: Lara Croft accidentally triggers a Mayan apocalypse and races to stop the Trinity organization from completing a ritual that could destroy the world. As she navigates ancient tombs and confronts supernatural forces, Lara must resist a temptation to remake the world, and possibly her own parents, and ultimately sacrifices herself to save humanity, emerging at peace with her decision.

content.value: Lara Croft, the fiercely independent daughter of a missing adventurer, must push herself beyond her limits when she discovers the island where her father, Lord Richard Croft disappeared.

content.value: Rise of the Tomb Raider: 20 Year Celebration includes the base game and Season Pass, featuring all new content.

Explore Croft Manor in the new "Blood Ties" story, then defend it against a zombie invasion in "Lara's Nightmare." Survive extreme conditions with a friend in the new online Co-Op Endurance mode, and brave the new "Extreme Survivor" difficulty. This edition also features an outfit and weapon inspired by Tomb Raider III, and 5 classic Lara skins. Existing DLC will challenge you to explore a new tomb that houses an ancient terror in Baba Yaga: The Temple of the Witch, and combat waves of infected predators in Cold Darkness Awakened.

products.timelineDescription: Haunted by her experience on Yamatai, Lara Croft seeks the secret of immortality in the lost city of Kitezh. Together with her good friend Jonah, she confronts the Trinity organization and uncovers the truth about her fathers death while racing to stop Trinity from acquiring the Divine Source, an artifact of immense power. In the end, Lara destroys the Divine Source and resolves to continue her fight against Trinity.

content.value: Lara Croft & The Temple of Osiris is the sequel to the critically acclaimed Lara Croft & The Guardian of Light, and the first ever four-player co-op experience with Lara Croft. Featuring stunning visuals and a brand-new story, players must work together to explore the temple, defeat hordes of enemies from the Egyptian underworld, solve devious puzzles, and avoid deadly traps.

Lara must join forces with rival treasure hunter Carter Bell and imprisoned gods Horus and Isis to defeat the evil God Set. With the fate of the world at stake, Lara must recover the fragments of Osiris to stop Set from enslaving mankind.

They search for the dismembered body of Osiris to resurrect him, leading to a final battle where Set is defeated, and the curse is lifted. However, the temple remains guarded, hinting at future dangers.

timelineProducts.title: Tomb Raider: The Legend of Lara Croft

content.value: Following the events of the
Survivor Trilogy

, Lara Croft (voiced by Hayley Atwell) has abandoned her friends to embark on increasingly more perilous solo adventures. But she must return home when a dangerous and powerful Chinese artifact is stolen from Croft Manor by a thief with an uncanny personal connection. Her daring pursuit will take her on an adventure around the world and to the depths of forgotten tombs, where she will be forced to confront her true self, and decide just what kind of hero she wants to become.
Starring Hayley Atwell as Lara Croft, Tomb Raider: The Legend of Lara Croft premiers October 10th only on Netflix.

timelineProducts.shortDescription: Lara Croft must confront her traumatic past while unraveling an ancient mystery

content.value: Tomb Raider Reloaded features roguelike gameplay for the first time in the series. On your quest, you'll avoid hidden traps, discover ancient relics, solve a wide variety of puzzles and face off against different enemies and bosses both new and familiar to the Tomb Raider series.
Tomb Raider Reloaded will be supported by an ever-changing roadmap of new content, updates, events and features including stylized cartoon visuals that reimagine Tomb Raider in a new way.

timelineProducts.shortDescription: Clear the tombs or die trying! Play as the legendary Lara Croft in a brand new, action-packed mobile game. Drawing inspiration from classic Tomb Raider titles, wield Lara's iconic twin pistols and get ready for a globetrotting adventure!

content.value: Lara Croft & The Temple of Osiris is the sequel to the critically acclaimed Lara Croft & The Guardian of Light, and the first ever four-player co-op experience with Lara Croft. Featuring stunning visuals and a brand-new story, players must work together to explore the temple, defeat hordes of enemies from the Egyptian underworld, solve devious puzzles, and avoid deadly traps.

Lara must join forces with rival treasure hunter Carter Bell and imprisoned gods Horus and Isis to defeat the evil God Set. With the fate of the world at stake, Lara must recover the fragments of Osiris to stop Set from enslaving mankind.

timelineProducts.shortDescription: Lara Croft & The Temple of Osiris is the sequel to the critically acclaimed Lara Croft & The Guardian of Light, and the first ever four-player co-op experience with Lara Croft.

timelineProducts.timelineDescription: Lara Croft and her rival, Carter Bell, inadvertently unleash the evil god Set in Egypt and must join forces with the gods Horus and Isis to stop him. They search for the dismembered body of Osiris to resurrect him, leading to a final battle where Set is defeated, and the curse is lifted. However, the temple remains guarded, hinting at future dangers.

timelineProducts.timelineDescription: On her first expedition, Lara Croft is shipwrecked on an island and must survive against a cult worshipping the ancient Sun Queen, Himiko. Ultimately, Lara ends the curse and escapes the island, finally coming to understand her fathers search for the unknown.

timelineProducts.title: Tomb Raider: Underworld

fields.title: Tomb Raider Underworld logo

fields.name: PC & Console Games
fields.description: Experience Lara Croft's adventures as the Tomb Raider

content.value: Tomb Raider: Underworld represents a new advancement in exploration-based gameplay. As fearless adventurer Lara Croft explores exotic locations around the world, each location is designed with an incredible attention to detail resulting in breathtaking high-definition visual fidelity that creates a truly believable world and delivers a new level of challenge and choice. Master your surroundings by reaching new heights with the broadest range of acrobatic abilities and utilize objects within the environment to uncover new paths to explore. Discover ancient mysteries of the underworld hidden within the coast of Thailand, frozen islands in the Artic Sea, the jungles of Mexico, and more.

timelineProducts.shortDescription: As fearless adventurer Lara Croft explores exotic locations around the world, master your surroundings by reaching new heights with the broadest range of acrobatic abilities and uncover new paths to explore.

timelineProducts.timelineDescription: Lara Crofts search for her parents fate leads her to confront the resurrected Atlantean Natla and stop her plan to awaken the Midgard Serpent. timelineProducts.title: Tomb Raider: Anniversary

fields.title: Tomb Raider Anniversary Logo

fields.name: PC & Console Games
fields.description: Experience Lara Croft's adventures as the Tomb Raider

content.value: Tomb Raider: Anniversary retraces Lara Croft's original genre-defining adventure. This globe-trotting, 3rd person action-adventure game sees Lara in pursuit of the legendary Scion artifact. Using an enhanced Tomb Raider: Legend game engine, the graphics, technology and physics bring Lara's adventure and pursuit of a mystical artifact in a way that offers gamers a completely new game play experience. Re-imagined, Anniversary delivers a dynamically fluid and fast Lara Croft, massive environments of stunning visuals, intense combat and game pacing, and an enhanced and clarified original story.

timelineProducts.shortDescription: Tomb Raider: Anniversary retraces Lara Croft's original genre-defining adventure. Using an enhanced Tomb Raider: Legend game engine, the graphics, technology and physics bring Lara's adventure and pursuit of a mystical artifact in a way that offers gamers a completely new game play experience.

timelineProducts.timelineDescription: Driven by her mothers mysterious disappearance, Lara Croft embarks on a quest to find Excalibur, an ancient sword linked to the mythical realm of Avalon. She unravels the truth about her mothers fate, and confronts Amanda Evert, an old friend with a grudge. The journey culminates in a dramatic showdown that leaves Lara with new questions and a determination to continue her search for her mother.

content.value: A series of grisly murders brings Lara Croft into conflict with a sinister Alchemist from the past, and a secret alliance of powerful individuals shrouded in mystery.

Accused of the murder of her one time mentor, Werner Von Croy, Lara becomes a fugitive on the run. Pursued by police, she follows the Alchemist into a dark world of blood, betrayal, and vengeance where it is up to her to defeat this unholy alliance and stop them from unleashing their incredible powers on the world.

timelineProducts.title: Tomb Raider: Chronicles

fields.title: Tomb Raider V Chronicles Logo
fields.description: Tomb Raider V Chronicles Logo

fields.name: PC & Console Games
fields.description: Experience Lara Croft's adventures as the Tomb Raider

content.value: Lara Croft is missing in Egypt - presumed dead. Those closest to her gather together at the Croft Estate on a grey, rainy day for a memorial service in her honor. Afterwards, the friends sit quietly together in the study of the Croft Mansion and reminisce about Lara's past exploits; exploits that have until now remained a secret. In flashback sequences, the player relives four of Lara's adventures: the hunt for the Philosopher's Stone in Rome, a deep-sea dive off the coast of Russia in search of the Spear of Destiny, an encounter with Hellspawn in Ireland, and a foray into an office complex in search of the Iris artifact.

timelineProducts.shortDescription: Lara Croft is missing in Egypt - presumed dead. Those closest to her gather together at the Croft Estate on a grey, rainy day for a memorial service in her honor. Friends reminisce about Lara's past exploits; exploits that have until now remained a secret.

timelineProducts.timelineDescription: Friends of Lara Croft recall untold adventures after her presumed death in Egypt. These include her quest for the Philosopher's Stone in Rome, the Spear of Destiny from a sunken submarine, and a battle against an ancient demon on the Black Isle. The story concludes with a glimmer of hope as her backpack is found by Von Croy in Egypt, leaving her fate unresolved.

timelineProducts.title: Tomb Raider: The Last Revelation

fields.title: Tomb Raider IV Logo US
fields.description: Tomb Raider IV Logo US

fields.name: PC & Console Games
fields.description: Experience Lara Croft's adventures as the Tomb Raider

content.value: According to Egyptian legend, Horus, son of the light, outwitted the evil God Set and imprisoned him in a secret tomb. Five thousand years later, Lara Croft discovers the lost tomb and unwittingly unleashes Set, fulfilling the ancient prophecy of his return to plunge mankind into darkness. In a race against time, Lara must use all her wit and skill to re-imprison Set and save the world from Armageddon. Lara must overcome the most ingenious puzzles and infernal traps ever devised while facing terrifying evil from beyond the grave.

timelineProducts.shortDescription: According to Egyptian legend, Horus, son of the light, outwitted the evil God Set and imprisoned him in a secret tomb. Five thousand years later, Lara Croft discovers the lost tomb and unwittingly unleashes Set upon the world.

timelineProducts.timelineDescription: Archaeologist and adventurer Lara Croft embarks on a perilous quest to retrieve the Scion, a mystical artifact from Atlantis. After exploring ancient ruins and confronting deadly foes, including a showdown with the famous T-REX, she discovers the true intentions of her employer, Natla, an ancient Atlantean ruler. Lara ultimately destroys the Scion to prevent Natla from using it to dominate the world.
